title.en: A Prayer to the Great Omniscient Lord Tsongkhapa

text.en: Namo guru bhaṭṭarākāya!1
Single embodiment of the knowledge, love and power
text.en-trans: sé ché gyalwa gyatso tamché kyi

text.en: Of all the oceanic Victorious Ones and their heirs,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pa chik tu düpé ku

text.en: Venerable guru Lobzang Drakpa, while recalling
text.en-trans: jetsün lama lo zang drakpa yi

text.en: The liberational qualities of your secret body, speech and mind, I pray to you.
text.en-trans: sang sum namtar dren zhin solwa deb

text.en: Heroic Mañjuśrī assuming a human guise,
text.en-trans: jampal pawo mi yi zukdzin pa

text.en: Appearing to ordinary perception as a spiritual guide,
text.en-trans: tamal nang ngor geweshé su tön

text.en: Adorned with the saffron robes of a disciplined monk,
text.en-trans: trimden ngurmik dzinpa kün gyi gyen

text.en: Lobzang, Second Conqueror, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lo zang gyalwa nyipar solwa deb

text.en: Your body is pure, unstained by any trace of fault,
text.en-trans: nyepé drima dak ching tsangwé ku

text.en: With a wondrous fragrance to delight the victors,
text.en-trans: tsultrim pungpo yongsu dzokpa lé

text.en: Arising from your perfection of ethical discipline—
text.en-trans: mejung gyalwa gyewé drisung tul

text.en: Great arhat, foe-destroyer, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: drachom chenpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Inspired by love borne throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né tsewé shuk kyi drang

text.en: Your heart possesses only the wish to benefit others,
text.en-trans: zhen la penpa khoné tuk ngawa

text.en: Adorned with stainless moon-like kindness and compassion—
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé drimé da dré gyen

text.en: Master of intelligent benevolence, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: loden tukjé dakpor solwa deb

text.en: You eradicated thoughts of anger and their habitual traces,
text.en-trans: trowé küntok bakchak dangché jin

text.en: And now you guide beings as numerous as space is vast
text.en-trans: dro mang namkhé ta dang nyampa kün

text.en: Towards the excellent and sublime palace of awakening—
text.en-trans: changchub khang zang dampar triwa la

text.en: To you whose great courage is unfaltering, I pray.
text.en-trans: zhummé nyingtob chenpor solwa deb

text.en: You mastered the bodhicitta of cherishing others above yourself
text.en-trans: dakwé zhen ché changchub tuk jong shing

text.en: And bore all the maleficence of beings in this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: nyikdü kyewö lok drub tamché zö

text.en: By donning the robust armour of the six pāramitās—
text.en-trans: parol chin druk gocha tsenpo gö

text.en: Great bodhisattva, heir to the victorious, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gyalsé sempa chenpor solwa deb

text.en: You understood the essence of the scriptures, both sūtra and mantra,
text.en-trans: do ngak zhungluk kün gyi denyi rik

text.en: Were impeccable and unimpeded in exposition, debate and composition,
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsom la chaktok drima dral

text.en: And your noble activity extended throughout existence and quiescence—
text.en-trans: trinlé zangpö sizhi khyön künkhyab

text.en: Incomparable holder of the teachings in the Land of Snows, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gangchen tendzin tsungmé solwa deb

text.en: Outwardly, your mindstream is restrained by the pratimokṣa,
text.en-trans: chi ru sosor tarpé gyü dam shing

text.en: Inwardly, you preside over the treasury of the awakening mind,
text.en-trans: nang du changchub sem kyi ter la wang

text.en: Secretly, you are the foremost master of the wisdom of union—
text.en-trans: sangwa zungjuk yeshe drubpé tso

text.en: Vajra holder of the three sets of vows, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: sumden dorjé dzinpar solwa deb

text.en: You insightfully began a tradition of the Middle Way beyond extremes,
text.en-trans: tadral umé lam sol rigpé ché

text.en: Received the nectar of profoundest meaning from Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: jampé yang lé zab dön dütsi nyé

text.en: And took confidence from the play of Sarasvatī in your throat—
text.en-trans: yangchen drinpar rolpé pobpaden

text.en: To the one who appeared as a second Nāgārjuna, I pray.
text.en-trans: ludrub nyipar nang der solwa deb

text.en: You mastered Vajradhara’s secret treasury in particular
text.en-trans: khyepar dorjé chang gi sangwé dzö

text.en: And became a powerful holder of secrets,
text.en-trans: palden düpa gyuma demchok dang

text.en: A custodian of glorious Guhyasamāja, magical Cakrasaṃvara,
text.en-trans: dü kyi khorlo lasok ngak gyü kyi

text.en: Kālacakra and other tantras of the Mantra vehicle—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dakpo sang dzin wangpor solwa deb

text.en: Through perfectly pursuing the unerring, noble way
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam gyi shingté dröpa yi

text.en: Of the chariot that travels the road of the two stages,
text.en-trans: lamzang trulmé lekpar nyenpa lé

text.en: You attained the level of the four kāyas without difficulty—
text.en-trans: ku zhi gopang kawa mepar nyé

text.en: Sovereign Vajradhara, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khyabdak dorjé chang la solwa deb

text.en: In short, through understanding how all the teachings
text.en-trans: dorna tubpé tenpa malü kün

text.en: Of the Sage are personal advice beyond contradiction,
text.en-trans: galmé dampa tuk su chüpa lé

text.en: You surpassed every rival as a master of the teachings—
text.en-trans: tenpé dakpo drenda künpang pa

text.en: All-knowing noble lord, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün tamché khyenpar solwa deb

text.en: Since there is no one but you whom we might call
text.en-trans: shakya sengé tenpé sokshing ni

text.en: The vital axis of the teachings of the Lion of the Śakyas,
text.en-trans: khyö lé zhendu namyang mamikpé

text.en: You are supreme among rarities of the three worlds—
text.en-trans: khyö dra jikten sum na könpé chok

text.en: Second Lord of Sages, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tubwang nyipé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: All beings including the devas could spend every day
text.en-trans: dzepé namtar chashé tsam ré yang

text.en: Reciting even a fraction of your deeds of liberational,
text.en-trans: lha dang chepé nyinzhin drok la drel

text.en: For you are the foremost of all those worthy of praise—
text.en-trans: ngak ö ngakpa kün gyi zhir gyurpa

text.en: Venerable guru, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Now before the great regent, the magnificent Maitreya,
text.en-trans: danta jamchen gyaltsab chenpö drung

text.en: You are graced with the flower-like name Mañjugarbha
text.en-trans: jampal nyingpö tsen gyi metok ji

text.en: And constantly savour the Dharma of the Great Vehicle—
text.en-trans: tekchen chö la taktu longchö pa

text.en: Venerable guru, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: From this moment on, throughout all my lives to come,
text.en-trans: dak ni deng né tserab tamché du

text.en: May I bow in reverence at the Mañjughoṣa Guru’s lotus feet,
text.en-trans: jamyang lamé zhabpé tsuk tu kur

text.en: Free my mind through his well-spoken nectar-like instructions,
text.en-trans: lek sung dampé dütsi dak gyü drol

text.en: And always adhere to the pure livelihood of the Kadampas.
text.en-trans: kadam namtar tsangma dzinpar shok

text.en: May the venerable guru’s magnanimous resolve, aspirations,
text.en-trans: jetsün lamé tukkyé mönlam dang

text.en: Enlightened activity, knowledge, love and spiritual power
text.en-trans: dzepa trinlé khyen tsé nü tu nam

text.en: Become fully present in the minds of all without exception,
text.en-trans: malü drowé gyü la yongsu dzok

text.en: And, with such power, may we serve the teachings and beings!
text.en-trans: ten drö dön nam drub la tuden shok
